attributes.action: Introduce an ID card pilot scheme to be rolled out to MPs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If MPs are so certain that ID cards will prevent terrorism and reduce crime such as identity theft, then they should pilot a scheme over the next couple of years for elected MPs only.  MPs should have to show their 
ID card, when attending parliament and other sites of security, such as government ministries.
